nodes.documentation:
Simple Random Number Generator based on a trusted third party.
 The trusted third party determine the random number and get all the contributions.
nodes.name: TrustedRNG

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The caller must be the owner."

arguments.value: The caller must be the owner.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The caller must be the owner."

nodes.documentation:
@dev Contribute to the reward of a random number.
 @param _block Block the random number is linked to.
nodes.name: contribute

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The random number cannot already be set."

arguments.value: The random number cannot already be set.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The random number cannot already be set."

nodes.name: giveRN
getRN
